text: Unke Rasoolon ne unsey kaha â€œwaqai hum kuch nahin hain magar tum hi jaise Insaan, lekin Allah apne bandon mein se jisko chahta hai nawazta hai aur yeh hamare ikhtiyar mein nahin hai ke tumhein koi sanad laa dein. Sanad to Allah hi ke izan (permission/will) se aa sakti hai. Aur Allah hi par ehle iman ko bharosa karna chahiye
